DOC.detailed_description: Indications : Patients advance reproductive age wish receive preimplantation genetic screen ART . Objectives : To demonstrate Preimplantation Genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) significantly reduce spontaneous abortion increase ongoing pregnancy rate patient advance maternal age ( 37-42 ) undergo IVF . Test Method : Preimplantation Genetic Screening FISH Treatment : In Vitro Fertilization treatment . The result embryos test group undergo embryo biopsy follow PGD FISH use 10-probe test `` result rescue '' . Study Population : 978 infertile woman undergo ART Major Inclusions : Premenopausal infertile woman wish conceive , age 37 42 year , inclusive , regular menstrual cycle screen early follicular phase FSH within normal limit . Major Exclusions : Clinically significant systemic disease ; contraindication pregnancy carry pregnancy term ; know ASRM Grade III IV endometriosis ; clinically significant abnormal finding transvaginal ultrasound within 6 week prior begin OCP treatment ; extrauterine pregnancy within 3 month prior begin OCP treatment ; poor response previous ART cycle ( ≤ 3 oocyte retrieve ) ; ≥ 3 prior , initiate , consecutive ART cycle without clinical pregnancy ; prior severe OHSS ; TESA TESE patient ; patient carrier chromosomal genetic disease . Randomization : Eligible patient randomize 1:1 ratio either : Group A : Hatching `` '' Group B : Hatching + PGS Study Procedures The study conduct outpatient basis . All pre-study screening assessment perform prior treatment start . Post-treatment Oocyte retrieval embryology procedure Procedures perform accord usual practice study center . Test Method Hatching , embryo biopsy , fixation Fluorescence in-situ Hybridization ( FISH ) perform strictly line methodology include protocol carry technician certify Reprogenetics . Primary Endpoint : ongoing pregnancy rate ( past 2nd trimester ) . Secondary Endpoints : implantation rate , pregnancy rate , miscarriage rate live birth .
